title: New Mobile Business Order Process - Order Management Q1
description:
Description
For an internal user
who wants to create one or more new mobile contract on behalf of the customer
the Order Management as part of NGMobile
is the joint work of our shopping cart with a checkout as well as order status, order tracking and order post-processing
that saves the configuration of one or more products with correct prices in a shopping cart. The contents of the shopping cart are transferred to the checkout by the user.
In the checkout, all contractual information is collected, provided and checked so that the product configuration with all necessary contract information can be converted into one or more valid orders.
The status of orders is displayed in the order overview. If necessary or possible, current orders can be changed or modified.
Unlike todays solution like GK-P, MBSP, BSP or MB2B
our solution provides all necessary order information at all times and no additional system is required to display the content or status of orders or to change orders when necessary.
